films.title: Interstellar
films.description: A fantastic representation on why bookcases are still relevant and can save the future.
films.tagline: The End of Earth will not be the End of Us.

films.title: Swiss Army Man
films.description: Suicide is never the answer. Taking care of a dead body that was a magician and is now fully capable of being a naturalised version of a go-go gadget is, however.
films.tagline: The First Fart will make you laugh, the Last Fart will make you cry.

films.title: Halloween (1978)
films.description: What's more sinful than murder? Having sex before you're 18! Watch out, Ol' Michael Myers is out there, proving abstinence is the only way you'll stay alive. 100% Safe!
